dcterms:creator: A. Bagdanov
A. D. Bimbo
I. Masi
dcterms:description: The MICC dataset contains challenging face videos of 53 subjects, with ground-truth 3D models acquired using a structured-light scanning system, allowing for comparison of 3D face shape estimates with ground truth shapes.
dcterms:title: MICC

dcterms:creator: G. B. Huang
M. Ramesh
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW) is a database for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments, providing a benchmark for evaluating face recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW)

dcterms:creator: L. Wolf
T. Hassner
I. Maoz
dcterms:description: YouTube Faces (YTF) is a dataset for face recognition in unconstrained videos, designed to evaluate algorithms under challenging conditions.
dcterms:title: YouTube Faces (YTF)

dcterms:creator: B. F. Klare
B. Klein
E. Taborsky
A. Blanton
J. Cheney
K. Allen
P. Grother
A. Mah
M. Burge
A. K. Jain
dcterms:description: IARPA Janus Benchmark-A (IJB-A) is a dataset designed to push the frontiers of unconstrained face detection and recognition, providing a challenging benchmark for evaluating face recognition systems.
dcterms:title: IARPA Janus Benchmark-A (IJB-A)

dcterms:creator: D. Yi
Z. Lei
S. Liao
S. Z. Li
dcterms:description: CASIA WebFace is a dataset for learning face representation from scratch, containing a large number of labeled face images.
dcterms:title: CASIA WebFace
